Package edu.sru.thangiah.webrouting.controller

Class LoginController

java.lang.Object
edu.sru.thangiah.webrouting.controller.LoginController
@Controller public class LoginController extends Object
Handles the Thymeleaf controls for pages dealing with the login function
Since:
2/6/2022
Author:
Logan Kirkwood llk1005@sru.edu

    • registrationShipperInitial

      Redirects user to the registration shipper page and adds a new instance of a User to the userForm model.

      Returns:

    • registrationShipper

      @PostMapping("/registrationshipper") public String registrationShipper(@ModelAttribute("userForm") User userForm, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult bindingResult)
      Adds a user to the database. Checks if there are errors in the form.
      If there are no errors, the user is saved in the userService. and the user is redirect to /registrationshipper
      If there are errors, the user is redirected to the registrationlogin page.
      Parameters:
      userForm - Stores information on the user
      bindingResult - Ensures the user inputs are valid
      Returns:
      "registrationshipper" or "registrationlogin"

    • registrationCarrierInitial

      @GetMapping("/registrationcarrier") public String registrationCarrierInitial(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Redirects user to the registration carrier page and adds a new instance of a User to the userForm model.
      Parameters:
      model - Used to add data to the model
      Returns:
      "registrationcarrier"

    • registrationCarrier

      @PostMapping("/registrationcarrier") public String registrationCarrier(@ModelAttribute("userForm") User userForm, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult bindingResult, org.springframework.ui.Model model, String carrierName, String scac, String ltl, String ftl, String pallets, String weight)
      Adds a user to the database. Checks if there are errors in the form.
      Creates a new instance of a carrier.
      Associates that carrier with the user.
      If there are no errors, the user is saved in the userService. and the user is redirect to /registrationcarrier
      If there are errors, the user is redirected to the registrationlogin page.
      Parameters:
      userForm - Stores information on the user
      bindingResult - Ensures the user inputs are valid
      model - Used to add data to the model
      carrierName - Name of the carrier
      scac - SCAC of the carrier
      ltl - If the carrier offers LTL
      ftl - If the carrier offers FTL
      pallets - Number of pallets offered by the carrier
      weight - Weight carrier can hold
      Returns:
      "registrationcarrier" or "registrationlogin"

    • registrationLogin

      @GetMapping("/registrationlogin") public String registrationLogin(org.springframework.ui.Model model, String error)
      Tries to login the user. If successful, user is redirected to the index page.
      If there are errors, the error is added to the error model and the user is redirected to "registrationlogin".
      Parameters:
      model - Used to add data to the model
      error - Returns an error if username or password are invalid
      Returns:
      "redirect:/" or "registrationlogin"

    • login

      @GetMapping("/login") public String login(org.springframework.ui.Model model, String error, String logout)
      Tries to login the user. If successful, the user is redirected to the index page.
      If there are errors, the error is added to the error model and the user is redirected to "login".
      If the user logs out, the logout message is added to the message model.
      Parameters:
      model - Used to add data to the model
      error - Returns an error if there is one during login
      logout - Returns a string if the user logs out
      Returns:
      "redirect:/" or "login"

    • welcome

      @GetMapping("/") public String welcome(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Redirects the user to the index page from /
      Parameters:
      model - Used to add data to the model
      Returns:
      "/index"

    • error403

      @GetMapping("/403") public String error403()
      Displays the 403 access denied page
      Returns:
      "/403"

    • getLoggedInUser

      public User getLoggedInUser()
      Returns the user that is currently logged into the system.
      If there is no user logged in, null is returned.
      Returns:
      user2 or null
